4. City Secretary

City Secretary
==============

The office of the City Secretary is committed to providing excellent service in management, emphasizing areas of responsibility, and rendering exceptional customer service to citizens, the City Council, and staff.

* Posting of notices of City Council meetings as required by the Texas Open Meetings Act, Chapter 551, Government Code
* Attends meetings of City Council
* Ensures the minutes of city council meetings are kept
* Prepares and preserves the actions and records of the City Council, including ordinances, resolutions, minutes, and contracts
* Serves as the city’s authority for Open Records Requests in accordance with the procedures set in the Public Information Act.
* Oversees city elections

Maintains the official city seal and attests official documents

Open Records Request:
[/DocumentCenter/View/1085](https://cityofbrazoria.org/DocumentCenter/View/1085)
